questions.clue: Sacramento is the capital of this state
This state's flag features a grizzly bear
English names for cities in this state include Saint Francis and (City of) the Angels
Napa valley is a popular tourist destination in this state
The majority of Interstate 5 is in this state
El Capitan can be found here
The only President to resign was born in this state
"You can check out any time you like but you can never leave" describe the fictional Hotel with this state's name
This state has the longest Pacific border of any Continental U.S. state
This state is home to the majority of Death Valley National Park
The NFL football team named after those who searched for gold in this state plays in the Levi's Stadium
